object
Class Edge

java.lang.Object
  object.Edge

public class Edge
extends java.lang.Object

An edge object consists of the edge weight, as well as an edge ID. This is what joins two nodes together and is the value the algorithm tries to minimize.

Author:
Curtis Stokes

Field Summary
private  int EDGE_ID
          This is a uniquely identifying feature of an edge which is assigned on creation.
private static java.util.ArrayList<Edge> edgeList
          A dynamic array list of edges that will hold all edges currently in the problem and solution.
private  int edgeWeight
          This is the weight of the edge signifies the magnitude (e.g distance) between two nodes and is what is minimized in the Primm's and Kruskals algorithm.
private static int IDToGive
          This is a counter in order to keep providing unique ID's, it is increased every time a Edge is made and will equal the highest id+1 when a problem is opened.
 
Constructor Summary
Edge(int weight)
          Default constructor, used when creating a new edge with a weight.
Edge(java.lang.String[] details)
          Constructor used when creating an existing object after opening a problem.
 
Method Summary
static java.util.ArrayList<Edge> getAllEdges()
          Get the list of all the edges.
static Edge getEdgeFromID(int id)
          Gets an edge object based on its ID
 int getID()
          Method used to get the ID of the edge that called it.
 java.lang.String[] getSaveDetails()
          Get the details of the edge in the save format used by the program
 int getWeight()
          Method used to get the weight of the edge that called it.
static void setIDToGive(int highestID)
          Used to set the correct value for the edge ID to give new edges.
 void setWeight(int weightIn)
          Sets the weight of an edge, used for updating existing edges.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Field Detail

edgeList

private static java.util.ArrayList<Edge> edgeList
A dynamic array list of edges that will hold all edges currently in the problem and solution.

IDToGive

private static int IDToGive
This is a counter in order to keep providing unique ID's, it is increased every time a Edge is made and will equal the highest id+1 when a problem is opened.

EDGE_ID

private final int EDGE_ID
This is a uniquely identifying feature of an edge which is assigned on creation.

edgeWeight

private int edgeWeight
This is the weight of the edge signifies the magnitude (e.g distance) between two nodes and is what is minimized in the Primm's and Kruskals algorithm.
